definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Lawn downhill there is a small mountain god tei miu.
sentences.chinese: 大草坪下坡還有一座小小的山神土地廟。

sentences.english: Which of the following can best describe Atlas according to the text?
sentences.chinese: 下面哪一個能最佳描述在原文中的艾特略山神？

sentences.english: Zhangxian Dragon Boat Festival, cowboy mountain worship.
He was secretly united with Oenone, a fair and faithful mountain fairy maiden.
sentences.chinese: 他偷偷地與奧諾妮，一位漂亮忠誠的山神結了婚。

sentences.english: This natural limestone cave is called the "Cave for the Mountain God".
sentences.chinese: 這個天然形成的溶洞被稱爲“山神洞”。

sentences.english: Hercules knew it was Atlas, the Mountain God.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉克勒斯知道這是阿特拉斯，山神。

sentences.english: With the introduction of the concept of immortals from the Han dynasty on, the mountain god gradually became defined as Lord Lu.
sentences.chinese: 隨着漢代以降神仙說的傳入，山神逐漸確定爲廬君。

sentences.english: Attached are old photos showing me performing smoke sacrifice to the local mountain god.
sentences.chinese: 附呈的舊照是我向在地的山神修煙供的相片。

sentences.english: At Olympus Zeus ruled as the father of gods and men.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯作爲山神和人類之父主宰着那裏的一切。

sentences.english: Last time I showed the old stove used for smoke sacrifice as inspired by the local mountain god.
sentences.chinese: 上回我展示依本地山神感應而制的煙供舊爐。

sentences.english: Nuwa mountain and is the main target of worship.
sentences.chinese: 山神與女媧是供奉的主要對象。

sentences.english: Shooters ceremony to be held the next day, the Mountain Festival.
sentences.chinese: 第二天舉行射獵大典，祭山神。

sentences.english: I like a mountain, is in charge of the mountain Lin Qingyu the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我彷彿是那座山，是掌管着山林青鬱的山神。

definition: god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
Tudi Gong, the God of the earth
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
Lei Gong or Duke of Thunder, the God of Thunder in Chinese mythology
